With Theo Ratliff on the injured list and Matt Geiger suspended, Allen Iverson outplayed Kobe Bryant and the 76ers used a platoon of reserve centers to deal with Shaquille O'Neal en route to an impressive 112-97 victory over the Los Angeles Lakers. We knew we were outmatched. We didn't have two of our big men, but we just knew we had to come out and play some ball, Allen Iverson said after scoring 40 points and handing out nine assists in 40 minutes. The rep added: Halle Berry has always made the needs and safety of her daughter her first priority and, both while Halle Berry and Gabriel Aubry were a couple and since their break-up, Halle Berry has only acted in her daughter's best interest. The couple split in April after five years together and had previously agreed to share joint custody of their daughter. leader. Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Page and Google Inc. 's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google Inc. 's executive chairman. The changes will be effective April 4. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, Eric Schmidt said.`` There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly,'' Page said.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous

the company needs to overhaul search, build a social network and figure out the best strategy for operating systems. As for advocacy, that's all Eric Schmidt . His blog post says he'll be focusing on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership. In other words, his only job now is to make Google look nice to the outside world.( In that case, he might want some practice at avoiding Google Apologizes for Buzz Privacy Issues- PCWorld
